title: KCET
content: What all documents are we supposed to submit while offline reporting to the college? Is attestation required??

comments.body:
Admission order
12th marks card
10th marks card 
Aadhar card
Migration certificate
TC
4 passport size photo and stamp size photo
Study certificate
Reservation documents if any
Payment challan 

That's all

Thank youu! 
And what about attestation?
2 Xerox copy of the original documents, self attested in the Xerox copy
